attributes.action: Stop cuts to Devon & Somerset Fire & Rescue Service
attributes.background: Proposed cuts to fire services in Devon & Somerset will cost lives

rejection.details:
This is a decision for Devon and Somerset Fire and Rescue Service, and is being consulted on locally. You can find out more about the consultation here:

https://www.dsfire.gov.uk/AboutUs/HaveYourSay/Index.cfm?siteCategoryId=2&T1ID=13

You could start a new petition calling for a clear action that is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, for example to increase funding for Fire and Rescue Services, if that's something you'd like to happen.
